WorkItem.ClosedComment: When SelectionUnit is Cell, the grid does not support selecting row items, which is what IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem does.
WorkItem.Description:
The following xaml throws an exception:
<Window x:Class="WpfDataGridTest.Window1"
		xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"
		xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"
		xmlns:toolkit="http://schemas.microsoft.com/wpf/2008/toolkit"
		Title="Window1" Height="300" Width="300">
    <Grid>
		<toolkit:DataGrid ItemsSource="{Binding}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" SelectionUnit="Cell">
			<toolkit:DataGrid.Columns>
				<toolkit:DataGridTextColumn Header="Name" DataFieldBinding="{Binding Path=Name}" />
			</toolkit:DataGrid.Columns>
		</toolkit:DataGrid>
    </Grid>
</Window>
